description: You will learn how to find a job, where to stay and how to avoid pitfalls in Britain. This great course is based on work with 300 people moving to foreign country, Britain in this case. I have a agency that helps workers from overseas find the job and provides accommodation. We also offer guidance on National Insurance Number and bank account opening. You can all learn it right here without spending your hard earned cash. You will save hundreds of dollars (dollars, euros whichever applies to your home country).
title: Job & house hunting overseas-Britain (includes an eBook)
